comment1: Name represents name of the variant or name of the entity
comment2: model and animation fields represent file names located in assets/uelessreptile/geo/entity/*dragon ID*/ and assets/uelessreptile/animations/entity/*dragon ID*/ respectively
comment3: *dragon ID* represents path part in entity's ID. I.e. for Swamp Wyvern dragon ID would be wyvern, for Moleclaw - moleclaw, for River Pikehorn - river_pikehorn
comment4: It's not necessary to declare both name and model fields. In fact, you can declare neither of them
comment5: If you wish to make certain variant inaccessible via nametag just add "nametag_accessible": false (like in barren_brown)
comment6: Redirect declarations can be added under any namespace. And you better to not use uselessreptile namespace for them unless you want to overwrite default ones
comment7: Full path to redirect file would look something like this: assets/yournamespace/model_redirect/*dragon ID*.json
comment8: Comments do nothing btw, you can yeet them
